sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, } from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, [match]) return (

{product.name}

Price:€{product.price}

Description:- {product.description}

Price: €{product.price} Status: {product.status} Go Back
) } export default ProductScreen
